text: Allakh obeshchal im, veruyushchim muzhchinam i zhenshchinam, ray, gde tekut reki i gde oni vechno prebyvat' budut v rayskom blazhenstve. On obeshchal im blagiye zhilishcha v sadakh vechnosti. Dlya nikh budet blagovoleniye Allakha, kotoroye oni budut chuvstvovat'. Eto - velichaysheye blago i prekrasneyshaya udacha
